name: Coffee
description: Our classic coffee blend offers a bold and invigorating flavor that will awaken your taste buds. Enjoy the perfect balance of smoothness and strength in every sip.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Beat the heat with our refreshing Iced Coffee. Brewed to perfection and served chilled, it's the perfect way to cool down while enjoying the robust flavors of our premium coffee.

name: Latte
description: Indulge in the creamy delight of our signature Latte. This velvety concoction combines rich espresso with steamed milk for a luxurious and satisfying experience. Ask about our syrups...

name: Matcha Latte
description: Experience the serene and vibrant flavors of our matcha latte, a true delight for tea lovers. Our matcha latte is made with finely ground Japanese green tea powder, known as matcha, carefully whisked to create a smooth and frothy beverage.

name: Doppio
description: For those who crave a strong caffeine kick, our Doppio delivers a double shot of espresso. This intense and aromatic brew will keep you energized and focused throughout the day.

name: Croissant
description: Indulge in the buttery and flaky goodness of our freshly baked croissants. Made with layers of delicate pastry, each bite is a perfect balance of crispy exterior and soft, airy interior.

name: Blueberry Muffin
description: Sink your teeth into the heavenly goodness of our blueberry muffins. Bursting with plump and juicy blueberries, each bite is a delightful explosion of fruity flavors.

name: Egg Tart
description: Treat yourself to the delectable indulgence of our egg tarts. These delicate pastries feature a buttery, flaky crust that cradles a smooth, creamy custard filling.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Experience a delightful and nutritious culinary creation with our avocado toast. We take artisanal bread, toasted to golden perfection, and generously spread it with ripe, creamy avocados.
